## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [downloadFile(machine, path, binary)](./sfapi.utilitiesservice.downloadfile.md) |  | <p>Download File Download a \_small\_ file from a NERSC system.</p><p>- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*path\*\*: the remote path of the file - \*\*binary\*\*: (optional) If true the file will be returned base64-encoded</p> |
|  [listDirectory(machine, path)](./sfapi.utilitiesservice.listdirectory.md) |  | <p>Read Directory List a directory on a NERSC system</p><p>- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*path\*\*: the remote path of the directory</p> |
|  [runCommand(machine, formData)](./sfapi.utilitiesservice.runcommand.md) |  | <p>Run Command Run a command on a NERSC system</p><p>- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*executable\*\*: the executable to run. Note that if you want to run a bash command, you must first run bash. Eg.: <code>bash -c &quot;echo $PWD&quot;</code></p><p>This command will return a task id that can be looked up via the /tasks/task api. The body of the task will be the result of the executable.</p> |
|  [uploadFile(machine, path, formData)](./sfapi.utilitiesservice.uploadfile.md) |  | <p>Upload File Upload a \_small\_ file to a NERSC system.</p><p>- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*path\*\*: the remote path of the file - \*\*file\*\*: the file uploaded from your local machine</p> |
